forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
